name: Find the Moles (Minesweeper clone) a Greenfoot Game
name_original: Find the Moles (Minesweeper clone) a Greenfoot Game
description:
Your grandpa needs help, with his moles in his garden! QUICK, grab your sword and shovel and exterminate!

Find the Moles is a Minesweeper clone, where the bombs are moles and the tiles are grass squares.

Find the Moles is a Greenfoot application you have to download Greenfoot  in order to play this game.

Most of the game is in german btw. , but it doesn't really matter.

Controls:

Press left mouse button to remove a grass tile                                                                              Press right mouse button to stab a sword into the grass or mole skull "flag"
